Mahindra XUV700 Diesel AX7 L Automatic Delivery starts. Image – Suresh Suthar.

articles.title: India reaches 40 per cent target of power from non-fossil fuel - The New Indian Express
articles.description: As per the government, the country’s installed Renewable Energy (RE) capacity today stands at 150.05 GW while its nuclear energy-based installed electricity capacity stands at 6.78 GW.
